head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MILLER, BETTI S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MILLER, BETTI S.

block.p: MILLER--Betti S. 98, on October 26. Adored wife of the late Walter A. Miller. Loving mother of Judith Childs, NY; Ann Curran, Corvallis, MT; Elizabeth Dodge, Montpelier, VT; cherished grandmother of Jocelyn, Meredith, Brian, David, Andrea, Tracy and Andy; beloved aunt of Ralph, Paul and Stephen. Services 2pm Sunday, October 31 at Congregation Beth Elohim, 274 Garfield Pl at 8th Ave, Brooklyn. In lieu of flowers, contributions to Walter A. Miller Center at FEGS, 315 Hudson St, NY, NY 10013 or Planned Parenthood of NY.
